description.en:
BUZAR is a marketplace with wide functionality. BUZAR, like the ancient Oriental bazaars, combines the most simple and important functions for users of the network around the world: live communication through the messenger and mutually beneficial cooperation. On the platform at the same time will be implemented communication service and universal Super-marketplace. 
You ask so much about our project that we are very pleased with the interest of the community! We are open to suggestions from users on the implementation of BUZAR and therefore will hold a special vote on the new features that you would like to add to the platform. 
Our task is to create a unique product that is user-friendly. To do this, BUZAR team plans to make a multifunctional service with a sophisticated security system and a simple and clear interface. We want to create an oasis in the network, where communication between people will be alive and sincere, and business relations between participants will be based on trust.
